title: Balance: Personalized Meditation App
author: Ruby Bacanovic
description: Balance: Personalized Meditation App designed by Ruby Bacanovic for Elevate Labs. Connect with them on Dribbble; the global community for designers and creative professionals.
cleaned_text: The new meditation app I've helped design is now out in the app store! Our entire team at Elevate Labs, as well as our awesome contractors, have put so much hard work and love into this product! I'm super happy & proud to present Balance: the world's first personalized meditation audio program. Each user's experience in Balance is unique, from the visual flows to audio meditations. The design accounts for every user journey while keeping a simple and visually appealing style. We created hundreds of animations and illustrations to ensure each user has a unique and beautiful experience. Visit the Balance website for more information. Download Balance for free in the App Store. Android version is coming soon. Team:
